content.rendered:
Entry Level Outside Sales | Oklahoma and Nation Wide Nationally recognized company looking for energetic and independent Sales Agents.
  • Must have less than 5 years experience and College Degree from a Four-Year University with a minimum cumulative GPA of 2.5
  • Looking for hard-working, enthusiastic, confident and competitive candidates.
  • Should have Minimal Job Changes.
  • Show documentation of Sales Achievements for Individuals with Previous Sales Experience
  • $50K Starting Base Salary that Increases with Your Lifetime Sales, PLUS Uncapped Commission

Should have Minimal Job Changes. Show documentation […]
